metadata.raw:
Mosquito Class Light Escort (Military Starship)

The Mosquito was designed to meet the standard Imperial Navy specification of 4G maneuver and Jump-4 capability. Armor has been sacrificed in this design to retain agility. An evaluation squadron of four ships was under construction at Rhylanor when news was received of the Emperor's assassination.

CraftID: Mosquito Class Light Escort, TL15, MCr667.7
Hull: 900/2250, Disp=1000, Config=1AF, Armor=40G, Unloaded=9888t, Loaded=12,166t
Power: 34/68, Fusion=9000MW, Dur=30 days
Loco: 45/90, Jump 4, 99/198, Maneuver=4, Agility=4, NOE=190kph, Cruise=2295kph, Max=3060
Comm: Radio=System, LaserComm=System, MaserComm=System
Sensors: EMM EMS Active(Far Orbit), EMS Jammer(Far Orbit), EMS Passive(Interstellar), High Pen Densitometer(1km), Neutrino Sensor(10kw), ActObjScan=Rout, ActObjPin=Rout, PassObjScan=Rout, PassObjPin=Rout, PassEnScan=Simp, PassEnPin=Rout

          Batteries    4
